00017 #include "MisrWriteData.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 
00029 MTKt_status MtkWriteBinFile(
00030   const char *filename, 
00031   MTKt_DataBuffer buf,  
00032   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo   )
00033 {
00034   FILE *fp;         /* File pointer */
00035   char infofname[300];      /* Filename plus extension */
00036   char rawfname[300];       /* Filename plus extension */
00037   char *datatype[MTKd_NDATATYPE] = MTKd_DataType;
00038                 /* Datatype description mapping */
00039   int i;            /* Loop index */
00040   int endian = 1;       /* Endian test */
00041   char *endian_ptr = (char *)&endian;
00042 
00043   if (filename == NULL)
00044     return MTK_NULLPTR;
00045 
00046   /* Write binary file */
00047   strcpy(rawfname, filename);
00048   strcat(rawfname, ".raw");
00049   if ((fp = fopen(rawfname, "wb")) == NULL) {
00050     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Error opening binfile");
00051   }
00052   fwrite(buf.dataptr, buf.datasize, buf.nline * buf.nsample, fp);
00053   fclose(fp);
00054 
00055 
00056   /* Write info file */
00057   strcpy(infofname, filename);
00058   strcat(infofname, ".info");
00059   if ((fp = fopen(infofname, "wb")) == NULL) {
00060     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Error opening infofile");
00061   }
00062 
00063   fprintf(fp, "filename = %s\n", rawfname);
00064 
00065   fprintf(fp, "image.header_bytes = 0\n");
00066   fprintf(fp, "image.nline = %d\n", buf.nline);
00067   fprintf(fp, "image.nsample = %d\n", buf.nsample);
00068   fprintf(fp, "image.datatype = %s\n", datatype[buf.datatype]);
00069   fprintf(fp, "image.datasize = %d\n", buf.datasize);
00070   if (endian_ptr[0] == 1)
00071     fprintf(fp,"image.byteorder = little_endian\n");
00072   else
00073     fprintf(fp,"image.byteorder = big_endian\n");
00074 
00075   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.path = %d\n", mapinfo.path);
00076   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.start_block = %d\n", mapinfo.start_block);
00077   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.end_block = %d\n", mapinfo.end_block);
00078   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.resolution = %d\n", mapinfo.resolution);
00079   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.resfactor = %d\n", mapinfo.resfactor);
00080   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.nline = %d\n", mapinfo.nline);
00081   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.nsample = %d\n", mapinfo.nsample);
00082   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pixelcenter = %s\n",
00083       mapinfo.pixelcenter == 1 ? "true" : "false");
00084   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.ulc.x = %f\n", mapinfo.som.ulc.x);
00085   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.ulc.y = %f\n", mapinfo.som.ulc.y);
00086   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.ctr.x = %f\n", mapinfo.som.ctr.x);
00087   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.ctr.y = %f\n", mapinfo.som.ctr.y);
00088   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.lrc.x = %f\n", mapinfo.som.lrc.x);
00089   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.som.lrc.y = %f\n", mapinfo.som.lrc.y);
00090 
00091   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.ulc.lat = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ulc.lat);
00092   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.ulc.lon = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ulc.lon);
00093   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.urc.lat = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ulc.lat);
00094   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.urc.lon = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ulc.lon);
00095   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.ctr.lat = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ctr.lat);
00096   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.ctr.lon = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.ctr.lon);
00097   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.lrc.lat = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.lrc.lat);
00098   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.lrc.lon = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.lrc.lon);
00099   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.llc.lat = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.lrc.lat);
00100   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.geo.llc.lon = %f\n", mapinfo.geo.lrc.lon);
00101 
00102   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.path = %d\n", mapinfo.pp.path);
00103   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.projcode = %ld\n", mapinfo.pp.projcode);
00104   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.zonecode = %ld\n", mapinfo.pp.zonecode);
00105   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.spherecode = %ld\n", mapinfo.pp.spherecode);
00106   for (i = 0; i < 15 ; i++)
00107     fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.projparam[%d] = %f\n", i, mapinfo.pp.projparam[i]);
00108   for (i = 0; i < 2 ; i++)
00109     fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.ulc[%d] = %f\n", i, mapinfo.pp.ulc[i]);
00110   for (i = 0; i < 2 ; i++)
00111     fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.lrc[%d] = %f\n", i, mapinfo.pp.lrc[i]);
00112   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.nblock = %d\n", mapinfo.pp.nblock);
00113   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.nline = %d\n", mapinfo.pp.nline);
00114   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.nsample = %d\n", mapinfo.pp.nsample);
00115   for (i = 0; i < 179 ; i++)
00116     fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.reloffset[%d] = %f\n", i, mapinfo.pp.reloffset[i]);
00117   fprintf(fp, "mapinfo.pp.resolution = %d\n", mapinfo.pp.resolution);
00118 
00119   fclose(fp);
00120 
00121   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00122 ERROR_HANDLE:
00123   return MTK_FAILURE;
00124 }
